COMMENT_TX: umpchange,4,umphome,hudsm901 umpchange,4,ump2b,iassd901 $Plate umpire Jerry Layne struck by a pitch on the mask; he left after the half-inning with a cervical sprain; 2B umpire Marvin Hudson moved to the plate and Dan Iassogna entered the game at 2B

Debut game for Kyle Snyder

ej,fossc001,P,cuzzp901,Throwing behind batter after HR ej,littg801,M,cuzzp901,Fossum's ejection $the first pitch after Mike Sweeney's homer was behind Raul Ibanez; Red Sox pitcher Casey Fossum Manager Grady Little ejected by HP umpire Phil Cuzzi

ej,higgb001,P,millb901,Called third strike ej,trama001,M,millb901,Called third strike on Higginson Tigers Bobby Higginson ejected by HP umpire Bill Miller; Tigers Manager Alan Trammell ejected by 3B umpire Jeff Kellogg
$the Red Sox score 10 runs before making an out setting a new record
the Red Sox score 14 runs in the inning
Marlins Kevin Olsen hit in head with line drive, left field on stretcher
Marlins angry at 'running up the score' on SF, hit Ortiz, both benches warned

ej,almoh001,P,carlm901,Throwing behind batter after warning ej,littg801,M,carlm901,Almonte threw behind batter $Red Sox pitcher Hector Almonte threw behind Andy Fox in retaliation for Ortiz HP; Almonte and manager Grady Little ejected by HP umpire Mark Carlson
Debut game for Nate Bump
This really is 61 force out. Liner to shortstop who dropped ball, 2bman did not cover, and pitcher did
1:20 delay during game
$10,000th home run in Fenway Park; 4th park to reach this milestone
Athletics Mark Mulder left the game due to an injured leg. On 8-21 placed on DL with tendinitis of right hip Later diagnosed as fracture in femur
